name: Typinator
description:
Advance through countless waves of evil blacksmiths by typing their word and loosing an arrow in their direction before they reach you! Experience a gradually intensifying track of background music as the situation grows dire.  

Discover the "nuke" and "health" powerups, and activate their powers by typing out their names in while they're on your belt.

Controls: 

- Spacebar and the Enter key can be used to clear the current entry.

- The Pause and Mute buttons can be toggled by clicking them.
